sectionSummary: This simple walkthrough will explain the research study, the impact it may have on your life and will allow you to provide your consent to participate.
sectionHtmlContent: Before completing the enrollment and creating your study account, we will assess your understanding of this study. It is important that you understand what the study is about and what you will be asked to do during it. Feel free to contact the researchers with any questions.

sectionSummary: To better understand your evolving health, we will ask you to perform simple activities and respond to surveys.
sectionHtmlContent: We will send notices to your phone asking you to complete these activities and surveys. Your may choose to act at your convenience, (either then or later) and you may choose to participate in all or only in some parts of the study. Your may skip any questions that you do not with to answer.

sectionSummary: The study will ask you to answer questions about your health and any other medical conditions or health information that may impact occurrence or treatment.
This study will also gather sensor data from your iPhone and personal devices with your permission.
sectionHtmlContent: You will have the option to contribute activity data to this app. The activity data will be collected through: The sensors on your phone and any wearable activity device. Other applications and data available through Apple Health or Google Fit. You can choose to contribute just some or none of this data, and still participate in the study. NOTE: We will NOT access your personal contacts, other applications, personal photos or videos, nor text or email messages.

sectionSummary: Your study data (survey, activities and sensors) will be combined with similar data from other participants.
sectionHtmlContent: Your coded study data will be combined with those of other study participants to be analyzed. Your account information (name, email, etc.) will be separated from your coded study data. The study will minimize the risk to your identity and your privacy where possible. NOTE: We will NEVER sell, rent, or lease your contact information.

sectionSummary: We will replace your name with a random code. The coded data will be encrypted and stored on a secure Cloud server.
sectionHtmlContent: We will use a random code instead of your name on all your study data. This code cannot be used to re-identify you. The data will be encrypted and stored on a secure Cloud server.

sectionTitle: What is Being Done With My Data?
sectionSummary: Your coded data will be used for research and may be shared with other researchers worldwide.
sectionHtmlContent: By analyzing the data from all app users, we may be able to better achieve the goals of this study. We may also make more progress by sharing this data with other researchers. Transmitting the data collected in this study may count against your existing mobile data plan if you are not on WiFi. However, the amount of data generated and transmitted by the app is expected to be small.

sectionTitle: How Much Time Will It Take to Participate?
sectionSummary: The surveys you will receive should only take 10 minutes or less to complete.
sectionHtmlContent: Giving consent, registering for the study and answering the first set of questions should take less than 30 minutes. You can stop and restart where you left off at any time. Using the app in this study will involve daily tasks that should only take 1 minute to complete, and weekly surveys that will take about 10 minutes to complete, for a total of less than 30 minutes per week. There will also be special monthly tasks you will be asked to complete that will not take more than 10 minutes.

sectionTitle: Can I Choose Not to Participate?
sectionSummary: Your participation is voluntary. Your may withdraw your consent and discontinue participation at any time.
sectionHtmlContent: Your participation in this study is voluntary. Your may decide not to participate or you may leave the study at any time. If you withdraw from the study, we will stop collecting new data. The coded study data that you have already provided, and that has already been distributed, will not be able to be destroyed or deleted. To withdraw from this study please tap on the “Leave Study” link in the profile page of the application.

sectionSummary: You will be able to visualize your data and potentially learn more about trends in your health.
sectionHtmlContent: The study will return any insights learned from this study through public communications or research publications, but these insights may not be of direct benefit to you. The study cannot, and does not, guarantee or promise that you will personally receive any direct benefits from your participation in this study. However, you will be able to track your health and share this information with your medical doctor and anyone you choose.

sectionSummary: We will make every effort to protect your information, but total anonymity cannot be guaranteed.
sectionHtmlContent: We take great care to protect your information, however there is a slight risk of loss of privacy. This is a low risk because we separate your personal information (information that can directly identify you, such as your name or phone number) from the research study data to respect your privacy. However even with removal of this information. In the event of unauthorized access, it is sometimes possible to re-identify an individual. This risk, while low, should be considered before enrolling.
